page.title: 01LIVING: A NEW HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: My name is Mark Carey. I live in a modern housing estate just outside the vilage of Moulton and on the edge of Northampton. There are about 350 houses on our estate. There are 12 houses in our street and our house is number 10. It is detached and it has got 4 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, and 1 toilet upstairs. Downstairs we have a lounge, a dining room, kitchen, hall and porch. We also have got a garage and carport outside. At the front and back of our house we have gardens and in the back garden we have a greenhouse. We also have got gas central heating. My mum and dad moved into this house on may 17th 1974. The house was built in 1973 and Dapple Light bricks were used. Redland Tiles were used to make the roof.
